Posts.Content: I don't know if I can help, but I do hear you.  Sometimes, it helps just to know someone hears and cares.   You know you can't change the past, give yourself a break. Maybe you missed it.  Maybe not. Anxiety and guilt won't help you. The holistic stuff takes a lot longer to "work".  It is a slow go, and stress/anxiety are negatives that will suck you down the "black hole".   Try to grab those anxious thoughts before the hijack your heart. Enjoy each day.  It really is a gift.   This site is filled with people who are living with cancer and the overhanging "threat" .  YOU ARE NOT ALONE. We have all felt the tenacles of this "dreaded disease"...but fear and anxiety won't fix anything. Hugs from far away...
Posts.Title: Feeling so hopeless!!!!
